meanings.definition: A person or thing that tops something.
meanings.sent1: The cake had colorful toppers on it.
meanings.sent2: The toppers of the trees swayed in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended to be the toppers of the mountain during the game.
meanings.sent4: His achievements were the toppers of the competition.
meanings.sent5: The toppers of the waves crashed against the shore.

meanings.definition: A garment worn on the upper part of the body.
meanings.sent1: She picked out a cozy sweater with fluffy toppers.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show featured elegant toppers for the models.
meanings.sent3: The toppers she wore made her look like a walking rainbow.
meanings.sent4: Her toppers shielded her from the chilly breeze.
meanings.sent5: The toppers in the store varied from casual to formal styles.

meanings.definition: A high-quality or impressive example of something.
meanings.sent1: The chef's signature dish was a real toppers.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed historical artifacts that were toppers in their collection.
meanings.sent3: The toppers of the art exhibition left the visitors in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her performance in the play was the toppers of the night.
meanings.sent5: The toppers of the mountain range were visible from afar.
